text: @wrychrd @ec1vOld @mayorofhackney @EnvAgency The que needs to be asked why some road tax was not ring-fenced for retrofitting #SuDS, why #LTN & segregated #cyclepaths, pipeline & cable road excavations works are not stipulated to retrofit/incorporate #SuDS?Why too road #gulleypots to #CombinedSewageOutflows aren’t obsolete?

@SaveLeaMarshes @mayorofhackney @HackneyLabour @EnvAgency @LeeValleyPark @MeridianWater @stormwater_jo @Thames21 @EnfieldCouncil @haringeycouncil @thameswater @HighwaysSEAST @TfL @LDN_environment Other mitigations/interventions with robust outcomes for the #LondonLeaCatchment would be to daylight the #CarbuncleDitch (before it reaches #ClendishMarsh #SINC so not to destroy existing #habitatforwildlife)& #CSOs from the nearby NW/NE industrial areas & redirect through #SuDS

@SaveLeaMarshes @mayorofhackney @HackneyLabour @EnvAgency @LeeValleyPark @MeridianWater @stormwater_jo @Thames21 With the new high density development of @EnfieldCouncil UpperEdmonton @haringeycouncil TottenhamHale/NorthumberlandPk why hasn’t funding been sought? There are many national & global corps operating in the area too as well as @thameswater @HighwaysSEAST @TfL @LDN_environment

@SaveLeaMarshes @mayorofhackney @HackneyLabour @EnvAgency @LeeValleyPark @MeridianWater @stormwater_jo .@Thames21 ranks this location as 2nd highest #roadrunoff #pollution treatment opportunity within #LondonLeaCatchment https://t.co/O18uBvgYwC

@wrychrd @ec1vOld @mayorofhackney @EnvAgency I guess we should sack all those who need to drive to earn a living which I’m guessing is a huge percentage of the drivers who have been tainted as people polluting the streets.

@SaveLeaMarshes @mayorofhackney @HackneyLabour @EnvAgency A good start would be to depave along the @LeeValleyPark #TottenhamMarshes Watermead Way A1055 to @MeridianWater & install filter drains* This is not a poster park wetlands project but could be done in sections re funding 1/2  * slides by @stormwater_jo https://t.co/4YALyq2pfQ https://t.co/hOtSfO51O6
